resources.string: An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t run unless you update the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Check out the new update for %1$s!\nAvailable now on %2$s.
"Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?"
Add the page title of each link
Send original text, plus options below
Filter original text, send only links
Apply options below and send text without asking
Show preview and options below before sending text
Phone To Desktop is free software (as in freedom). The source code is on GitHub.
Phone To Desktop needs authorization to access your Google Tasks.
Try our extension for Google Chrome.
Do you want to delete this item?
Could not get the list, try again
Could not access server, try again later
Click to view wait list and try again
Add titles (if the links lead to web pages)
Phone To Desktop uses Google APIs Client for Java 1.10.0-beta and Google Tasks API 1.7.0-beta.
You need first authorize Phone To Desktop
No link detected, will send original text
An error was encountered retrieving data. Retry?
Phone To Desktop sends links and text from your Android device to your desktop computer
From any application which shares text, choose “share” option.
A list of applications which can receive text will be shown. Choose Phone To Desktop.
You will see a screen with a preview text and some options. Click Send when ready.
There will be a notification while Phone To Desktop sends the text. When the text is successfully sent, the notification goes away.
If there\'s some error, or if you don\'t have internet connection, the text is saved on the Wait list. Send all texts or select them to delete or send individually.
To see your sent texts in your desktop or notebook, choose Tasks in Gmail.
You can see the list of sent texts under the "Phone To Desktop" list.
Waiting authorization process. It may take some time.

string.name: wallet_buy_button_place_holder
string.translation_description: Text on a button that allows a user to make a payment with Google Wallet [CHAR LIMIT=30]
